title-group.article-title: A Priori Estimates of Smoothness of Solutions to Difference Bellman Equations with Linear and Quasi-Linear Operators

abstract.p: A priori estimates for finite-difference approximations for the first and second-order derivatives are obtained for solutions of parabolic equations described in the title.
